content: **crocheted hooded scarf in drops big merino the piece is worked in granny squares which are sewn together one size ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern mb-072 yarn group c or a + a ------------------------------------------------------- **size** one size fits head-size approx 54/60 cm **yarn** drops big merino from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 350 g colour 02 grey 200 g colour 01 off white if you want the piece in one colour you will need 500 g **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 4 mm **crochet gauge ** 17 treble crochets in width and 10 row in height on hook size 4 mm= 10 x 10 cm 1 small square measures approx 13 x 13 cm 1 large square measures approx 17 x 17 cm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size -------------------------------------------------------
